chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), LiftLift -> forall (wk k ws s : nat) (t : T), k >= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws s (lift wk (k - ws) t)

Premises:
Record Lift (T : Type) : Type := Build_Lift { lift : nat -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Lift _%type_scope Arguments Build_Lift [T]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
Record LiftLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLift { lift_lift : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) } Arguments LiftLift {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLift [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Build_LiftLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)) -> LiftLift
lift_lift : forall (t : ?T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?LiftLift : [ |- LiftLift]
Build_LiftZero : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (k : nat) (t : T), lift 0 k t = t) -> LiftZero
Build_LiftInjective : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2) -> LiftInjective
Nat.sqrt_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, q = p + p -> r <= q -> let s := Nat.sqrt_iter k p q r in s * s <= k + p * p + (q - r) < S s * S s
Record LiftInjective (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftInjective { lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments LiftInjective {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftInjective [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record LiftZero (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftZero { lift_zero : forall (k : nat) (t : T), lift 0 k t = t } Arguments LiftZero {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftZero [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftVar : forall (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Lift A), (forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x)) -> LiftVar
Nat.log2_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, 2 ^ S p = q + S r -> r < 2 ^ p -> let s := Nat.log2_iter k p q r in 2 ^ s <= k + q < 2 ^ S s
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
Record LiftVar (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Lift A) : Prop := Build_LiftVar { lift_var : forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x) } Arguments LiftVar {A}%type_scope {H H0} Arguments Build_LiftVar [A]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : ?T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?LiftInjective : [ |- LiftInjective]
lift_var : forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?A] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?A] ?LiftVar : [ |- LiftVar]
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
lift_zero : forall (k : nat) (t : ?T), lift 0 k t = t where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?LiftZero : [ |- LiftZero]
rotate = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) (n : nat) (t : T) => subst (var n) 0 (shift (S n) t) : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Lift T -> Subst V T -> nat -> T -> T Arguments rotate {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} _%nat_scope
Lift_idx = {| lift := fun w k x : nat => if le_gt_dec k x then w + x else x |} : Lift nat
subst_idx = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (v : V) (k x : nat) => match lt_eq_lt_dec x k with | inleft (left _) => var x | inleft (right _) => v | inright _ => var (x - 1) end : forall V : Type, Var V -> V -> nat -> nat -> V Arguments subst_idx {V}%type_scope {H} _ (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.tl = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.caseS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A n) (fun (_ : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n) => t) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0) n v Arguments VectorDef.tl {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
List.app_nth2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), n >= length l -> List.nth n (l ++ l') d = List.nth (n - length l) l' d
Build_Lift : forall T : Type, (nat -> nat -> T -> T) -> Lift T
traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> ?V) (p : nat) (t : ?T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T] ?TraverseRelative : [ |- TraverseRelative]
not_ge : forall n m : nat, ~ n >= m -> n < m
not_lt : forall n m : nat, ~ n < m -> n >= m
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Init.Nat.log2_iter = fix log2_iter (k p q r : nat) {struct k} : nat := match k with | 0 => p | S k' => match r with | 0 => log2_iter k' (S p) (S q) q | S r' => log2_iter k' p (S q) r' end end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.log2_iter (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
Nat.add_sub_eq_r : forall n m p : nat, m + p = n -> n - p = m

```coq
```coq
intros T H LiftLift wk k ws s t Hk.
unfold lift.
rewrite (lift_lift T H LiftLift t k s wk ws Hk).
reflexivity.
Qed.```
